message: Enhanced create_real_task() FULLY IMPLEMENTED and TESTED. Function at real_mcp_server.py:1334-1657 now accepts 5 new optional parameters with inline validation. All tests pass: backward compatibility maintained, validation warnings work, task_context stored correctly in registry, global registry includes enhancement flags.

BACKWARD COMPATIBILITY VERIFIED: All 4 existing create_real_task() tests PASS unchanged (test_create_real_task_success, test_create_real_task_with_client_cwd, test_create_real_task_default_priority, test_create_real_task_updates_global_registry). Zero breaking changes confirmed.
